title: Bengaluru Rameshwaram Cafe blast | Police probing networks of four absconding terror suspects
selftext: Owing to the similarities in the assembling of the explosive, the detonator, timer and the mechanism used to explode the bomb, between the recent explosion in the restaurant and the cooker bomb blast at Mangaluru on November 19, 2022, the police are now probing the networks of the absconding accused — Abdul Mateen Taha, 30, Musabir Hussain and ‘Colonel’ — in the Mangaluru case, the sources said.
comments: Why is this post not getting any interactions?
Saying something will get me in trouble!
People of the sub seem to be of a certain political bent is what I have gathered from a few days here.

Police is probing suspects, what's to interact in that?

Ekyc is something people know about and can help the guy. 

What interaction do you expect when there's just probing and suspicion? Guilty on basis of suspicion?
I'd like to quote Jose Mourinho at this moment
Can anybody tell me where actually the blast took place . Like on the roof in first floor , under the table etc and how big the scale was . Kind of unclear from the videos .
